p: Table 2 summarizes the viruses detected in both groups. In Group 1 members of the herpesvirus family predominated (9 cases) followed by enteroviruses (7 cases). Three arbovirus infections, two of DENV and one case of SLEV were also identified. In Group 2 an equal number of herpesvirus and arbovirus (2 DENV, 1 SLEV) infections were detected (3 cases each), followed by enteroviruses (2 cases).
